00050 class itoken

00127 class token : public virtual itoken
00128 {
00130     typedef std::unique_lock<std::mutex> guard;
00131 
00133     mutable std::mutex lock_;
00135     mutable std::condition_variable cond_;
00137     MQTTAsync_token tok_;
00139     std::vector<std::string> topics_;
00141     iasync_client* cli_;
00143     void* userContext_;
00149     iaction_listener* listener_;
00151     bool complete_;
00153     int rc_;
00154 
00156     friend class async_client;
00157 
00158     void set_topics(const std::string& top) { 
00159         topics_.clear();
00160         topics_.push_back(top); 
00161     }
00162     void set_topics(const std::vector<std::string>& top) {
00163         topics_ = top;
00164     }
00165 
00175     static void on_success(void* tokObj, MQTTAsync_successData* rsp);
00185     static void on_failure(void* tokObj, MQTTAsync_failureData* rsp);
00190     void on_success(MQTTAsync_successData* rsp);
00195     void on_failure(MQTTAsync_failureData* rsp);
00196 
00197 public:
00198     typedef std::shared_ptr<token> ptr_t;
00203     token(iasync_client& cli);
00208     token(iasync_client& cli, MQTTAsync_token tok);
00213     token(iasync_client& cli, const std::string& topic);
00218     token(iasync_client& cli, const std::vector<std::string>& topics);
00219 
00220     //token(const std::string& logContext);
00221 
00226     virtual iaction_listener* get_action_callback() const {
00227         // TODO: Guard?
00228         return listener_;
00229     }
00235     virtual iasync_client* get_client() const {
00236         return (iasync_client*) cli_;
00237     }
00242     //virtual exception get_exception();
00248     virtual int get_message_id() const { return int(tok_); }
00253     virtual const std::vector<std::string>& get_topics() const {
00254         return topics_;
00255     }
00259     virtual void* get_user_context() const {
00260         guard g(lock_);
00261         return userContext_;
00262     }
00267     virtual bool is_complete() const { return complete_; }
00272     virtual void set_action_callback(iaction_listener& listener) {
00273         guard g(lock_);
00274         listener_ = &listener;
00275     }
00280     virtual void set_user_context(void* userContext) {
00281         guard g(lock_);
00282         userContext_ = userContext;
00283     }
00288     virtual void wait_for_completion();
00294     virtual void wait_for_completion(long timeout);
00301     template <class Rep, class Period>
00302     bool wait_for_completion(const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period>& relTime) {
00303         wait_for_completion((long) std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>(relTime).count());
00304         return rc_ == 0;
00305     }
00312     template <class Clock, class Duration>
00313     bool wait_until_completion(const std::chrono::time_point<Clock, Duration>& absTime) {
00314         guard g(lock_);
00315         if (!cond_.wait_until(g, absTime, [this]{return complete_;}))
00316             return false;
00317         if (rc_ != MQTTASYNC_SUCCESS)
00318             throw exception(rc_);
00319         return true;
00320     }
00321 
00322 };
